name: Big Ugly Grasshopper
description:
For the game jam Game Off 2021 BUG! Theme

How To Play:

An outbreak in the city has occurred mutating its victims into what the media calls them BUGs (Big Ugly Grasshoppers) due to their disturbingly twisted legs and their ability to hop many times a human’s height.

Controls:

- A & D to move left and right

- Spacebar to jump

Score points by jumping off BUGs and keep your combo going before you land on the ground floor. But get squashed and you lose.
